short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension transcribes audio to  text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever want to watch a Youtube video but it doesn't have automatic CC enabled? No worries, with gimana2 you can still understand the content throught automatic speech-to-text transcription, right on top of the web page you're currently viewing.
